unit.utterance: Yek āqāyi bud ke čand tā sabad čide bud
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man who had put a few baskets

unit.utterance: ke golābi az deraxt bečinad biyāvarad tuye in sabadhā por bokonad
unit.utterance_translation: in order to fill them with the pears he picked from the tree

unit.utterance: albatte do tā sabad ke avalaš man didam
unit.utterance_translation: at the beginning I saw two baskets

unit.utterance: baad ke āmad yek sabad rā por kard
unit.utterance_translation: then he filled one of the baskets with pears

unit.utterance: dobāre raft bālā
unit.utterance_translation: he went up the tree again

unit.utterance: ke biyāyad masalan bāz dobāre tuye ān boqčeaš golābi bečinad berizad biyāyad pāyin ke sabade badi rā por konad
unit.utterance_translation: to pick the pears again, put them all in his clothes, bring them down and put them in the second basket

unit.utterance: ke tuye in fāsele vaqti ke havāsaš nabud
unit.utterance_translation: and while he was busy

unit.utterance: bālāye deraxt bud
unit.utterance_translation: he was on top of the tree

unit.utterance: in pesare bā dočarxe āmad rad šod raft
unit.utterance_translation: this boy on his bike passed

unit.utterance: va yek sabade por golābi rā gozāšt joloye dočarxe va raft
unit.utterance_translation: he put one of the baskets on his bike and left

unit.utterance: ke tuye rāh xord zamin, bā yek dočarxesavāre doxtar movājeh šod, havāsaš be doxtare part šod
unit.utterance_translation: on the way, he fell down because he encountered a girl and got distracted

unit.utterance: bad xord zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he fell down

unit.utterance: golābihāyaš rixt, yek dafe did se tā pesarbače hastand āmadand komakaš kardand, bolandaš kardand, dočarxe rā boland kardand, golābihā rā barayaš jam kardand
unit.utterance_translation: the pears spilled out of the basket, suddenly he saw a few boys who were standing there, they came to help him get up and gathered up the pears

unit.utterance: ke in šoru kard ke xāst ke harkat konad
unit.utterance_translation: when he wanted to leave

unit.utterance: yekdafe yeki az ān pesarhā did ke kolāhaš ān taraf part šode
unit.utterance_translation: one of the boys saw the little boy's hat on the ground

unit.utterance: sut zad, sedāyaš kard
unit.utterance_translation: he whistled

unit.utterance: kolāhaš rā beheš dād
unit.utterance_translation: he gave him back his hat

unit.utterance: va se tā golābi ham nemidanam nafahmidam keš raft yā u xodaš beh=eš dād be onvāne tašakor
unit.utterance_translation: and three pears in return he took himself or the boy gave him, I'm not sure

unit.utterance: bad hamān ān nešān dād ke ān āqā āmad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: then the man came down the tree

unit.utterance: did ke e yek sabade por golābi ke qablan čide bud nist
unit.utterance_translation: he noticed that one of his baskets was not there

unit.utterance: albatte aval ham do tā sabad bud, bāz alān ham do tā sabad bud, yekdāne por, yeki xāli
unit.utterance_translation: although I think at the begining there were two baskets too

unit.utterance: va āqāhe ke az deraxt āmad pāyin hiči tuye boqčeaš nabud, boqčeaš sāf bud ruye lebāsaš
unit.utterance_translation: and when the man came down the tree there was nothing in his clothes, it was empty

unit.utterance: bad u did ke ān pesarbačehā dārand miāyand golābi be dast az joloyaš rad šodand raftand, darhālike dāšt bā taajob negāh mikard .
unit.utterance_translation: then he saw the boys coming while there were pears in their hands, he got surprised and watched them as they were passing.
